_header: As Holy Writ witness and tell
_description: Three things that will never be completely filled, within Henry Daniel’s Liber Uricrisiarum or Dome of Urines, in Book II, chapter 7 — five couplets

HunHM505.First Lines:
As holy wrytt wytnesse and telleThere thingis shull neuer ben full
                    felleHelle is the ferste yl woman þe myddeCouetowse man that is
                    þe therde…
HunHM505.Last Lines:
…Sely is he that this evill fleenFor the peyne of hell shall
                    he not sene
HunHM505.Editions:
Hanna,  Ralph,
                        ed.  
             “The Index of Middle English Verse and Huntington Library Collections: A
                Checklist of Addenda.” 
             Publications of the Bibliographical Society of America
         74 (1980): 235-58: 239.
